title: Explicit Instruction-based Curriculum for Enhancing Critical Thinking in Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced Language Proficiency and Job-Related Expertise
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environment, this program includes practice-oriented tasks to strengthen language domain expertise.

learning_goals: Learners can identify five or more cognitive biases (e.g., confirmation bias, causal fallacy) occurring in various work scenarios.
Learners can write feedback explaining logical errors found in peers' reports/proposals with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can perform practical tasks (proposal reviews, decision-making analyses) applying critical thinking strategies at least three times and complete self-assessment forms.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
